modName: Skyrim Metal Covers DRAGON BATTLE MUSIC by Erock and Sbeast
summary: Dragon Battle Music Replacment with Erock and/or Sbeast\'s metal versions.
descriptionHtml:
**BEFORE YOU ASK, YES I HAVE PERMISSION OF THE ORIGINAL ARTISTS TO USE THEESE SONGS**

This replaces the dragon battle music with Erock and/or Sbeast\'s metal renditions.

I replaced all the boss music files in each pack.
You can use one, or the other, or mix and match.
If you wish to mix take only some files from each zip and drop them in your game folder.



If you want to test this out use the following console command:

player.placeatme 000FEA9B


To uninstall the entire mod simply delete the files it adds to the following folder:

/data/music/combat/

Please check out the original artists for these tracks.

Original track for Erock version:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yDE2VQzghp4

Original track for Sbeast version:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gyCFuP3rM2w

Erock\'s website:
http://www.shredguitareric.com/

Sbeast\'s twitter:
https://twitter.com/SbeastMusic
author: Excision
